theme_strategy.name: Apple Fintech Minimalism
theme_strategy.core_philosophy: Reduction until only the essential remains. Soft light, diffuse shadows, readable typography.

bento_grid.item_base: bg-white rounded-[24px] border border-gray-100 shadow-soft p-6 flex flex-col justify-between transition-all duration-300 hover:shadow-float hover:-translate-y-1 relative overflow-hidden group

buttons.primary: bg-[#3B82F6] hover:bg-[#2563EB] text-white rounded-full px-6 py-2.5 font-medium transition-all shadow-sm hover:shadow-md active:scale-95 text-sm
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-gray-200 text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-50 rounded-full px-6 py-2.5 font-medium transition-all text-sm

cards.standard: bg-white rounded-[24px] border border-gray-100 shadow-soft p-6
cards.glass: bg-white/70 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/40 shadow-glass rounded-[24px] p-6

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure text is #111827 or #374151 on light backgrounds.
accessibility.focus_states: All interactive elements must have visible focus rings (ring-2 ring-blue-500/20).

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'lucide-react' for all icons. Stroke width 1.5px or 2px.
Implement 'Recharts' for all charts. Remove grid lines where possible for cleaner look.
For the 'Overview' page, use a Bento Grid layout with cards spanning different column sizes.
Ensure the 'Financial Health Score' is the visual anchor (hero element) of the Overview.
Use the provided image URLs for background textures or abstract card headers only. Do not clutter the UI.
Strictly follow the color palette. No dark mode toggles.
Authentication pages should be clean, centered cards with a subtle blue gradient background.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. In frontend design, this creates what users call the 'AI slop' aesthetic. Avoid this: make creative, distinctive frontends that surprise and delight.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add '.App { text-align: center; }' in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§ ðŸ’­ðŸ’¡ etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects, and entrance animations. Static = dead.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories (especially sponsor logos) = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable
Create new components that match the style and conventions of existing components when needed
Examine existing components to understand the project's component patterns before creating new ones
Components MUST use named exports (export const ComponentName = ...)
Pages MUST use default exports (export default function PageName() {...})
Use 'sonner' for toasts. Sonner component are located in '/app/src/components/ui/sonner.tsx'
